entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Monday 24 April 2023
